statements: SELECT * FROM Musicians

SELECT musician_name, influence FROM Musicians WHERE genre_preference = 'Rock'

SELECT name, genre_preference FROM musician ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT influenced_by FROM influence;
SELECT m.name, i.influenced_by FROM musician m LEFT JOIN influence i ON m.id = i.musician_id;

SELECT title, genre_name FROM songs JOIN genres ON songs.genre_id = genres.id;
